text: The Himachal Pradesh dam is operating normally with no structural damage reported after recent rains.
Tehri Dam levels are stable and all gates functioning as per routine maintenance checks.
No breach at Sardar Sarovar Dam; water release is controlled and safe.
Kundala Dam inspection confirms full operational integrity post-monsoon.
Mullaperiyar Dam is structurally sound with normal water levels.
Fact Check: Rumors of Colorado Springs mayor Yemi Mobolade's FBI arrest are completely false, confirmed by his office.
Mayor denies lying to FBI; no arrest related to hate crime hoax investigation occurred.
New Orleans mayor arrest rumors debunked; no charges filed for alleged conspiracy.
Local mayor not arrested; viral claims stem from unverified social media hoaxes.
No evidence supports mayor arrest by federal agents; official statement clarifies misinformation.
2021 Uttarakhand flood video misrepresented as recent broken dam in 2024.
Old 2019 US Lake Dunlap spillway failure video falsely claimed as Indian dam collapse.
1994 DRC cholera photo recirculated as current conflict image.
2016 Hurricane Matthew video manipulated and mislabeled as 2024 Hurricane Milton.
2015 Delhi building collapse photo falsely shared as 2025 earthquake damage.
No official reports confirm water turns skin green; claim from anonymous blog lacks evidence.
Blog rumor of green skin from water dismissed; source credibility low, no government confirmation.
Anonymous source claims on water contamination debunked by high-credibility audits.
Fake news from unverified blog on dam blast; official checks show natural wear.
Rumor from low-trust anonymous commenter rejected; no backing from reliable outlets.
